info.title: Goibibo Developer API
info.description: You can make use of our travel options via this

get.description: This API doesn't need any parameter,It simply displays lists of cities. First number is city_id followed by city name, country name and country code.city_id would be needed for next API(/get_city_hotels/).

101.description: Internal Server Error (Returned when  Error occured in backend code

102.description: Check in Date should be greater than today date/Checkout date should be greater than check in date

103.description: Max 4 adults per rooms and minimum 1 adult per room and max 2 children per room

104.description: No of adults should be greater than 0 and no of rooms should be greater than 0

107.description: cancellation failed, please contact goibibo support

109.description: Required Query String, Returned when query string is not in required format

110.description: Couldn't find any property(Returned when hotels are not found under searched city)

111.description: Couldn't find booking (Returned when booking sent while confirm booking not found in database

112.description: You don't have enough amount in your account to book

114.description: Vendor does not Exist (When user authentication fails while making booking)

122.description: rpc and rtc params are required

123.description: Invalid customer details (Returned when any of the required customer detail is missed while provisional booking)

125.description: Invalid sort_type value (Returned when sort type sent during city hotels API doesn't match with required key)

126.description: Booking cannot be cancelled (Returned when provided gobookinid is already cancelled or doesn't have cancellation option)

127.description: Booking cannot be cancelled Online,Please contact Goibibo support team

get.summary: Produces list  of hotels for a particular city
get.description: This API requires 'city_id','checkin_date','checkout_date' and 'room_string' as parameters.'city_id' is obtained from the /get_city_list/ API'.No of passengers cannot exceed 9. No of rooms cannot exceed 4. Minimum of 1 adult required for booking. Number of minors/children cannot exceed number of adults. This API requires only one parameter which is a query-string in the order: hotels-cityid-checkin_date-checkout_date-room_string where value of cityid,check-in date and check-out date ( in format YYYYMMDD) and room-string has to be suffixed with hotels, separated with hyphen. Room-string contains number of rooms, no of adults separated with hyphen and number of children appended with under-score.Also in case of children, number of children should further be appended with their ages separated with underscores. If their are more than one rooms, number of rooms should be appended with number of adults and children in first room followed by number of adults and children in second room and so on.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: For example: hotels-2162254155836171767-20150423-20150425-1-2_0 Here, After hotels, first number is city id, next two numbers are checkin and checkout dates, 1 room is booked for 2 adults having no children.Room-string would contain 2-2_0-2_0 in stead of 1-2_0 for 4 adults staying in 2 rooms having no children.Here it shows that first room will be occupied by 2 adults and second room would be occupied by another 2 adults. If 4 adults,3 children are staying in 3 rooms where first room will host 1 adult, second room will host 2 adult and 1 child who is 3 years old  and 3rd room will host 1 adult and 2 children ( who are 4 and 5 years old), then  room string should be given as 3-1_0-2_1_3-1_2_4_5.

101.description: Internal Server Error (Returned when  Error occured in backend code

102.description: Check in Date should be greater than today date/Checkout date should be greater than check in date

103.description: Max 4 adults per rooms and minimum 1 adult per room and max 2 children per room

104.description: No of adults should be greater than 0 and no of rooms should be greater than 0

107.description: cancellation failed, please contact goibibo support

post.summary: Makes provisional booking and provides gobookingid
post.description: Takes query string,hotel code,ibp,rpc,rtc as url parameter and fwdp, which can be null and customer_details which will have items viz. firstname,lastname,email,mobile,country phone code and title as Form Data

parameters.name: hc

parameters.description: forward params can be obtained from /get_hotel_details/ API under rooms data

post.summary: Returns the status of booking, gobookingid and bookingid
post.description: To confirm booking, required params are secretkey which shown below and gobookingid which is obtained from Provisional Booking API

parameters.name: gobookingid
parameters.description: gobookingid is obtained from Provisional Booking API and is primary booking Id required to get status of booking and used as reference further

parameters.name: secretkey
parameters.description: Create a string as described below:  createhash = paymentsalt + gobookingid + '|'+ str(amount) + '|' + productinfo.lower()+ '|' + firstname.lower() + '|' + email + '|' + udf1  + '|'  + guest + '|' +"travelibibo" Values of amount,productinfo,firstname,email,udf1 and guest can be obtained from Provisional Booking API while payment salt will be shared secretly with your team. Now generate createhash using formula: createhash = sha512(createhash).hexdigest(). This createhash will be passed as secretkey.

get.summary: Returns flight details like fare, route, connecting flights,timings etc.
get.description: The search API enables you to search for operational flights based on specified parameters, i.e. route details, departure and arrival dates, cabin type and passenger details.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Response format

parameters.name: dateofdeparture
parameters.description: Departure Date(onward flights only) in ISO format i.e. YYYYMMDD. It must be after Arrival Date.

parameters.name: dateofarrival
parameters.description: Arrival Date(onward and return flights) in ISO format i.e. YYYYMMDD

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Origin Airport Code (A valid IATA code). Source should not be same as destination

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: Destination Airport Code ( A valid IATA code)

parameters.name: seatingclass
parameters.description: Travel Class/Cabin Type e.g. E(Economy), B(Business)

parameters.name: adults
parameters.description: No of Adults(0-9). Number of passengers cannot exceed 9. Minimum of 1 adult is required for booking.

parameters.name: children
parameters.description: No of Children(0-9).

parameters.name: infants
parameters.description: No of Infants(Can't exceed No of Adults)

parameters.name: counter
parameters.description: Choice of carriers e.g. 0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7,100,101

parameters.name: discountedflights
parameters.description: optional parameter, if Y, gives discounted flights

102.description: Departure Date is after Arrival Date

105.description: Repricing failed with airlines or flight full, please try again after some time or choose another flight

106.description: Fare does not match, please do a reprice

109.description: Children should be between 2 and 12 years of age

110.description: Infants should be below 2 years of age

111.description: Adults should be above 12 years of age

113.description: Minimum of 1 adult required for booking

114.description: Inconsistency with passenger data and bookings for each passenger type

115.description: Date of Birth mandatory for Child and Infant Passengers

118.description: No of infants cannot exceed no. of adults
